english.segment1: Watch out heaven 'cause here I come. Storm the gates, 'Cause we have won. Boldly before your throne. I'm coming, I'm coming home (2x)
english.segment2: The devil ain't got no thing on me, Because I'm taking back, taking back, my authority. (2x)
english.segment3: Set watchmen on the wall. Keep them now, standing tall. Set me apart from this world. I'm coming, I'm coming home (4x)
english.segment4: I'm taking back, taking back my authority
english.segment5: I'm taking back, taking back my city now
english.segment6: Shake the heavens, Lord. With forty days of war. Break rebellion, send revival to America. (3x)
